data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 26143, Version Hash: bfe36cd72ad944fa51e3d9e874222190bcc4e217
data.actual_result: Screen stays in the same place
data.expected_result: Screen should move up and you could read earlier messages
data.short_description: Trying to use scroll button to scroll through messages only works in some places of the screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Set the zoom level to any lower than 90 - move your cursor to the right of the messages screen - Click the scroll button on your mouse - move the cursor up
